survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Eco-Friendly Cleaning Products Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, purchasing behaviors, and attitudes toward eco-friendly cleaning products to help companies improve product offerings and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase eco-friendly cleaning products?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase eco-friendly cleaning products?

questions.question_text: Which factors most influence your decision to buy eco-friendly cleaning products? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection to capture priority factors. Randomize answer order to avoid bias.

questions.question_text: What is the biggest barrier preventing you from purchasing more eco-friendly cleaning products?
answer_options: Higher cost compared to conventional products
Lack of availability in local stores
No barriers—I already purchase them regularly
questions.routing_logic: Ask if Q1 response is 'Sometimes', 'Rarely', or 'Never'.
